content: The Fungiwoman can be found near the Temple of the Yellow Flowers. From the temple entrance, take the path on the left and head up the stairs, taking out enemies as you go. You will come across a small, concrete clearing with two Snake Herbalists and a couple of centipedes to defeat.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fungiwoman_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Fungiwoman Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Fungiwoman Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Fungiwoman can be found near the Temple of the Yellow Flowers. From the temple entrance, take the path on the left and head up the stairs, taking out enemies as you go. You will come across a small, concrete clearing with two Snake Herbalists and a couple of centipedes to defeat.
